dashboard.description:
# Assess hardware readiness
Assess which devices need to be replaced or upgraded, and the devices that are ready for migration.
**Summary** * Track how many devices need to be replaced, upgraded, or are ready for migration. * Track how many devices need further investigation. * Track the above information for laptops and desktops.
[Configuration guide](https://doc.nexthink.com/Documentation/Nexthink/latest/LibraryPacksConfiguration/Win10:Migration)
dashboard.name: Assess hardware readiness

dashboard.description:
# Assess software readiness
**Summary** * Only packages that are prioritized are displayed in this dashboard! * Verify that all packages are assessed as "Ready" or "Not ready" for Windows 10.
**Top 100 packages assessed** * Verify the top 100 packages that have been tested and received an assessment.
**Top 100 prioritized packages to assess readiness on Windows 10** * Only the packages that are Business critical or User critical are displayed. Test them on Windows 10 in order to assess if they are ready or not.
[Configuration guide](https://doc.nexthink.com/Documentation/Nexthink/latest/LibraryPacksConfiguration/Win10:Migration)
dashboard.name: Assess software readiness

metric.label: Win10 - Top packages with priority assessed by nb devices

tableConfig.title: Top 100 prioritized packages to assess readiness on Windows 10

metric.label: Win10 - Top packages with priority not assessed by nb devices

dashboard.description:
# Migrate to Windows 10 Migrate to Windows 10.
**Devices to migrate** * Track how many devices are ready to migrate to Windows 10. * All applications are prioritized and set as ready. * The hardware is ready for migration. * Send a campaign to these users to ask if they are ready. * Wait for the user's response and check how many devices are laptops and desktops. * Monitor on a daily basis the progress of the migration.
**Devices to replace** * Track how many devices are ready to replace to Windows 10. * All applications are prioritized and set as ready. * The hardware is not ready for migration and needs to be replaced. * Send a campaign to these users to ask if they are ready. * Wait for the user's response and check how many devices are laptops and desktops. * Monitor on a daily basis the progress of the migration.
**Devices to upgrade** * Track how many devices are to be upgraded. * Applications may or may not be ready. * The hardware is not ready and some components needs to be replaced (disk or RAM). * Send a campaign to these users to ask if they are ready. * Wait for the user's response and check how many devices are laptops and desktops. * Monitor on a daily basis the progress of the migration.
[Configuration guide](https://doc.nexthink.com/Documentation/Nexthink/latest/LibraryPacksConfiguration/Win10:Migration)
dashboard.name: Migrate to Windows 10

dashboard.description:
# Monitor device performance Monitor your devices performances on devices running Windows 10 and compare the performance with devices to migrate.
**6 performance indicators** * Compare the 6 performance indicators of devices running Windows 10 with devices to migrate.
[Configuration guide](https://doc.nexthink.com/Documentation/Nexthink/latest/LibraryPacksConfiguration/Win10:Migration)
dashboard.name: Monitor device performance

dashboard.description:
# Monitor employee experience With the help of the Digital Experience Score, monitor your employee experience on devices running Windows 10 and compare the scores with devices to migrate.
**Digital Experience Score** * Compare the overall Digital Experience Score (and five sub-scores) of devices running Windows 10 with devices to migrate.
[Configuration guide](https://doc.nexthink.com/Documentation/Nexthink/latest/LibraryPacksConfiguration/Win10:Migration)
dashboard.name: Monitor employee experience

metric.label: Win10 - Overall DXS by Win10 migration status
Win10 - Device DXS by Win10 migration status
Win10 - Business apps DXS by Win10 migration status
Win10 - Web browsing DXS by Win10 migration status
Win10 - Productivity DXS by Win10 migration status
Win10 - Security DXS by Win10 migration status

dashboard.description:
# Monitor employee satisfaction
**Pre-migration & Post-migration satisfaction** * Survey your employees before the migration to Windows 10 to define a baseline satisfaction. Run the same survey after Windows 10 is installed to assess an improvement or a deterioration of the overall satisfaction.
**Satisfaction breakdown** * See the distribution of the satisfaction.
**What users like the most** * Compare the positive points before and after the migration to Windows 10.
**What users dislike the most** * Compare the negative points before and after the migration to Windows 10.
[Configuration guide](https://doc.nexthink.com/Documentation/Nexthink/latest/LibraryPacksConfiguration/Win10:Migration)
dashboard.name: Monitor employee sentiment

dashboard.description:
# Monitor the migration progress
**Summary** * Track how many devices are running Windows 10 and how many need to be migrated. * Monitor on a daily basis the overall progress of the migration. **By region** * Track the progress of the migration by region.
[Configuration guide](https://doc.nexthink.com/Documentation/Nexthink/latest/LibraryPacksConfiguration/Win10:Migration)
dashboard.name: Monitor migration progress
